All functions

commas

Collapse string with commas

edit_rstudio_recent_projects

Open file to manually edit RStudio's list of Recent Projects

explore_dependencies

Explore dependencies between functions in a package.

get_path_to_listed_rproj

Get the path to the file that stores RStudio's projects list.

handy

Handy Tools

install_missing_load_all

Given package names, install missing ones and load all

msg_guest_token

Print GUEST_TOKEN to pass to auto_token argument of devtools::install_Github

msg_open

Print messages that commonly open documents.

open_snippets open_dir open_proj open_inst open_data open_data_raw open_docs open_man open_r open_tests open_testthat

Open files and directories of a project and package.

pass_arguments

Reformat arguments for funcitons, from arg1, arg2 to arg1 = arg1, arg2 = arg2

prefix_file

Add a prefix to a file name.

search_function

Search functions in a package matching a pattern.

to_xy_value

Gather columns and rows of a matrix to variables x and y of a tibble.

unlist_rstudio_proj

Remove specific projects from RStudio's list under File > Recent Projects.

unwhich

Convert integer to boolean representation.

use_git_commands

Add ./git.R with common git commands.

write_fun_dependencies

Write a file with all dependencies of a user-defined function.
